emails.subject: üöÄ KICKOFF-4# Hack-Nation Global AI Hackathon
emails.content:
Get ready for the kickoff! We start at 11:00 AM ET sharp on Zoom.

Dedicated Zoom Link, do not use the Zoom desktop notification (it might be wrong): https://mit.zoom.us/j/99162894059

Don't miss out on a total of ~$160K OpenAI, Cursor, ElevenLabs or Lovable credits provided to hackers that are ready to build.

emails.subject: Urgent: Discord Access & Team Formation
emails.content:
If you haven't joined the Discord yet, do it now: https://discord.gg/vPmTYGXEHN

All team coordination happens there. If you are still looking for a team, head to the #find-a-team channel. Remember: Max 4 members per team.

emails.subject: API Keys for OpenAI & ElevenLabs Released
emails.content:
We have released the $160K in API credits!

Login to the platform to claim your team's unique keys for OpenAI (GPT-4) and ElevenLabs. Note: These keys are rate-limited and valid only for the duration of the hackathon.

emails.subject: Challenge Reveal: The 'Health-Tech' Track
emails.content:
The special challenge for the Health-Tech track is live.

Challenge: Build an AI agent that can parse unstructured medical PDFs into structured JSON.

Valid datasets are pinned in the #health-track Discord channel. Good luck!

emails.subject: 10 more minutes to request OpenAI credits - deadline extension
emails.content:
Deadline extension: OpenAI credit requests will remain open for another 10 min.

1. Get your Org-ID from OpenAI's website (not chatGPT): https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/general
2. Request the credits: https://projects.hack-nation.ai/#/api-credits

emails.subject: Mentor Office Hours: Cursor & Lovable
emails.content:
I'll be hosting an office hour session in the Zoom breakout room 'Mentors-1' starting at 2:00 PM ET.

Come ask questions about Vercel deployment, Cursor workflows, or frontend styling with Lovable.

emails.subject: Submission Portal is now OPEN
emails.content:
You can now start drafting your submission on Devpost.

Requirement: You must include a 2-minute demo video link (YouTube or Loom).
Deadline: Sunday 9:00 AM ET (Hard stop).

emails.subject: CONFLICT: Mentor Session Moved
emails.content: Correction: The Mentor session with Lee Robinson is actually at 3:00 PM ET, not 2:00 PM. Please adjust your schedules.

emails.subject: WiFi Issues at SF Hub
emails.content: We are aware of the WiFi outage at the San Francisco hub. We are working on it. Mobile hotspots are available at the front desk.

emails.subject: Win a pure gold keyboard!
emails.content: Best use of Convex gets a custom gold-plated mechanical keyboard. API docs attached.

emails.subject: Pizza Arriving (In-Person Hubs)
emails.content: Pizza has arrived at London and Boston hubs! Take a break and grab a slice.

emails.subject: Team Registration Deadline Warning
emails.content: You have 1 hour left to finalize your team members on the platform. No changes allowed after 7 PM ET.

emails.subject: Mid-Hack Checkpoint
emails.content:
We are halfway through! How is everyone feeling? Remember to drink water.

Mentors are going offline for the night in 1 hour.

emails.subject: API Rate Limits Increased
emails.content: We noticed many teams hitting the OpenAI rate limits. We have doubled the quota for all teams. Happy hacking!

emails.subject: Looking for frontend help
emails.content: Our React dev dropped out. Anyone free to join team 'CodeCrush'? We have a working backend.

emails.subject: REMINDER: 4 Hours to Submission Deadline
emails.content:
Teams, you have exactly 4 hours left.

Ensure your code is pushed to GitHub and your repository is public. If you are using a private repo, invite 'hacknation-judge' as a collaborator.

emails.subject: Connectivity Issues on the Platform?
emails.content: We are seeing a spike in traffic to the submission portal. If you get a 504 Gateway Timeout, please refresh and try again. Do not leave your submission to the last minute!

emails.subject: Video Upload Processing Delays
emails.content: YouTube and Loom imports are taking longer than expected. Please upload your video files directly if links don't work.

emails.subject: FINAL CALL: Submission Deadline in 30 Minutes!
emails.content:
This is the final warning. The portal closes automatically at 9:00 AM ET.

If your video is still rendering, submit the text description first and edit the link in the next 5 minutes. GO GO GO!

emails.subject: SUBMISSIONS CLOSED
emails.content: The submission portal is now closed. Judges are beginning their review.

emails.subject: Relax & Pitch Prep
emails.content: Take a breath! You did it. While judges review, get some sleep or prepare your pitch just in case.

emails.subject: Top 16 Finalists Announced!
emails.content:
The judges have deliberated.

The Top 16 teams selected to pitch live are listed here: [Link to Doc]

If you are on this list, join the 'Main Stage' Zoom immediately. You will have 2 minutes to pitch.

emails.subject: CONFLICT: Finalist Announcement Time
emails.content: Correction: Finalists will be announced at 2:00 PM ET, not 1:30 PM. Apologies for the confusion.

emails.subject: Final Pitch Session Instructions - PLEASE READ
emails.content:
Dedicated Zoom Link (Do not use desktop notification): https://mit.zoom.us/j/99162894059

Format:
* 2 minutes to pitch
* Ready to screen share
* Practice your pitch!

emails.subject: Voting for 'Community Choice' Award is Open
emails.content:
While the judges decide the Grand Prize, YOU decide the Community Choice winner.

Vote for your favorite project on the platform now. Voting closes in 20 minutes.

emails.subject: Congratulations to our Winners! üèÜ
emails.content:
What an incredible weekend!

1st Place: Team Neuro-Sync
2nd Place: Team Agent-X
3rd Place: Team Health-AI

All participants: Check your email for participation certificates and sponsor perks ($$$).

emails.subject: Post-Hackathon Networking & Mixer
emails.content:
The official hacking is over, but the networking continues!

Join us on Discord voice channels or the local meetups in San Francisco, Munich, and London for pizza and drinks. See you next year!

emails.subject: Exclusive Credits for Winners
emails.content: Winners, please reply to this email to claim your $2500 in API credits.

emails.subject: Lost and Found - SF Hub
emails.content: Found: One MacBook charger and a 'Rust is great' sticker. Come pick it up at the front desk.

emails.subject: Tell us how we did!
emails.content: Please fill out this 2-minute survey to help us improve next year. One lucky respondent will win an iPad.
